title: Girl with Looking-glass, from a photography album with images of Japan
marks:
Inscription

LLC, in negative: [B 1255 GIRL WITH
description: standing young woman wearing blue and grey striped kimono and black, pale green, maroon and pink obi; girl holds two mirrors so that she can see the back of her head; lute and vase of flowers behind woman; cosmetic box with another mirror in front of woman
creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
